note.p: Education: Norwich School; Trinity College, Cambridge; MB (1663); St Bartholomew's Hospital, London; Incorporated at Oxford (1666); Merton College, Oxford; DMed (1667, Oxford); Incorporated at Cambridge (1670)
Career: Lived in Norwich, where he practised dissection and studied botany; travelled widely in Europe (c1668-1669 and 1673); practised in London; Physician, St Bartholomew's Hospital, London (1682)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Venn; Foster; Hunter
Authority: Altname from DNB and Venn
